drops.title: Deplone
drops.subtitle: Deplone is a young visual artist, who turned his life upside down to chase what he really loves. Since he discovered his passion for 3D art and motion design he has developed his own distinct style. Tries to stay humble and anonymous. Works often influenced by the events from his personal life or day-to-day reflections about the world around him.
drops.description: This 6 piece collection was created with an intention to admire certain elements important to the creative process, but also life in general. The aim of every one of these six artworks is to make the new owner just take a small break and ponder about one of those topics, as well as admire their influence on the surrounding world. I chose the form factor of a surreal museum-like space, because ever since I was a small child, I thought about modern art galleries as the calm, quiet places designed to let the observer admire and reflect upon the odd, non-conventional and often controversial concepts. I hope that events taking place in this little space I designed in my head will succeed in their goal.

drops.title: Lazy Horse

Each Lazy Horse NFT grants access to the metaverse clubhouse and Lazy Horse Racing Game (drops end of January!), it also connects you to our real racing team. The Club owns, maintains and races horses with profits being shared by the community. All of the club's efforts are most importantly focused on providing a long and sustainable post-racing life for all horses. A large portion of all project proceeds will directly fund equine rescue and retirement, ensuring great lives for these beautiful animals.

drops.title: Space Crystal Unicorns
drops.subtitle: They are magical! Their strength lies in feeling and finding those in need. All funds raised will be used to support hippotherapy classes for children with disabilities.
drops.description:
Hello everyone, 

I have always had a passion for art which most already know, but what most donâ€™t know is that I am very fond of equestrian sports. Growing up I self-taught to become an equestrian rider. I have also judged equestrian events and competitions and organized charity festivals in support of children with disabilities. 

Riding horses can be very healing for children and their psycho-emotional state and for those who become more involved, assists with muscle development. I used to coach children for free but have retired from this. However, I keep in close contact with the equestrian club in my hometown and occasionally still assist by running the group classes for children. I also financially support and support them with media coverage, assisting with fund raising to help kids receive this amazing and free therapy with horses.

The Crohamsters are divided into 4 different factions (Miner, Space, Nature, Worker) and can fight against each other in the CroHamster-Arena. With this feature, we will be able to start a unique reward system for our community, in which they can win Cro rewards and points on a leaderboard thought fights in the arena. For this, each CroHamster has Attack and Defense combat stats that indicate how strong it is in fights against other CroHamsters. Additionally, if the CroHamster owns a weapon, it will get an attack bonus. To prevent stale and predictable fights, we will also use a random generated "Luck" and "Hit Percentage" value.

Every Crohamster who wants to take part in the arena fights can put their name on a list, two random CroHamsters from different factions are then selected from this list to fight against each other. The winner will then receive the mint price of a CroHamster NFT in Cro as prize (325Cro). They will also earn points on a leaderboard, allowing us to honor the best CroHamster fighters in a Hall of Fame, which qualifies them for additional Hall of Fame giveaways with unique NFT and CRO rewards.

The collection’s primary objective is to generate awareness and raise funds to support children who are impacted by ASD, Autism Spectrum Disorder, with essential sensory equipment.
drops.description:
The Rebel AUT Club is a new digital collection that is being launched to provide support to children with autism and their families. The collection will consist of 8 animal-themed NFTs with different attributes and rarities. 

When purchasing one of these unique NFTs, collectors will not only have the opportunity to own a one-of-a-kind piece of digital art, they will also be contributing to a good cause. Making a real impact in the lives of children with autism. 

As you may know, children with autism often have difficulty with sensory processing. This can impact their ability to engage in daily activities and interact with their environment.

Our project is centred around the donation of unique sensory equipment that is essential to the development and growth of vital social, fine, and gross motor skills. Along with the goal of providing support to these children in their daily lives.

Together we can make a difference! We would love for you to be a part of this amazing project and assist us in making a difference for children with ASD in all our communities. 

Thank you for your support!

Various merchs oriented from community activities, such as idea proposals, fan arts, will be produced and sold via online store. Figurines, Hats, Tees, Socks, Hoodies, etc will be designed by The Pogo Team.

-Pogoland
Using cutting edge technology & art direction we bring Pogo into The Pogoland Metaverse, A web3 crypto home of immersive experiences, from gaming to social hangouts, to concerts, fashion shows, education, and entertainment, connecting each other with our resources.

-Project Holder Benefits
This is not the end, it's only the beginning.
Pogo holder will be our first priority to benefit them with our future roadmap, partnership, future collection or even cross chain project.

drops.title: Cronos Towers
drops.subtitle:
Cronos Towers is a NFT collection of 1234 unique towers made with AI Midjourney + Scenario.

Our aim is to create more awareness about capabilities of new AIs while providing various utilities to holders of our NFTs. Such as, staking, free AI subsciptions, AI guides, secondary profits, P2E game, Metaverse experience and more.
drops.description:
UTILITIES

Access to our holder-exclusive AI Center Category in our Discord, which provides educational resources, news related to AI, and comparisons among similar AI bots. The AI Center will also offer subscription accounts and integrate AI technologies into the Discord, providing members of the community with access to AI-powered tools and features.

NFT staking service for the first 6 months, with a reward pool of more than 5,000 CRO according to our mint progress. Every owner will be able to stake their NFTs.

Art contests every month, with prizes and a chance for holders to showcase their creative skills. The best pieces of art contest entries will be a part of a special NFT collection and distributed among Royal holders who hold more than 15 NFTs.

Exclusive rewards for our top holders, including gift Gen2 NFTs, passive income, and more. Nobles (who hold 30+ NFTs) will receive 5x gift Gen2 NFTs + 1000 CRO and %50 of secondary profits will be distributed among them.

Development of a P2E tower defense game with extra benefits for our NFT holders.

A metaverse experience for our NFT holders, furthermore our goal is to create a vibrant and dynamic community that extends beyond the ownership of our NFTs and provides real value to our holders.

drops.title: Strange Camel Society
drops.subtitle: Introducing The Strange Camel - a one-of-a-kind collection of 4,000 custom-designed 3D Avatars. These stunningly beautiful avatars are aesthetically pleasing and carry special perks within the SCS ecosystem. The Strange Camel also tells a fascinating story about how camels were the only creatures to survive a deadly virus in 2969, leading to a thrilling adventure that you can be a part of.
drops.description:
Strange Camel has a long-term vision for its NFT collection. The ultimate goal is to create an ecosystem and metaverse revolving around StrangeCamel NFTs. The first steps to realize this vision are implementing a staking system and 'adding a metaverse to their site. By staking their avatars, users can earn valuable $SCS and become part of the community. 

In addition, The Strange Camel is planning to introduce a downtown land, fashion merch, a DAO system, an NFT lottery, and events/tournaments that will provide concrete utility to their NFTs. Join The Strange Camel on their journey to revolutionize the NFT space and become part of their family!

drops.title: Ballies Cheerleaders
drops.description: Ballies Cheerleaders are the new assets in the Ballies Metaverse. They are a set of 3333 completely unique basketball characters algorithmically generated from over 140 hand-drawn traits. They are amazing collectibles as well as super strong game assets. They have rarity skills to influence the Ballie's game and give you the advantage on the Meta-court. Own a Cheerleader Ballie and live out your basketball dream! Become the KING of the Meta-Court! Do you have what it takes?

drops.title: Barber Shop
drops.description: We are pleased to present "Barber Shop," the upcoming collection from Team Mustachios. By investing in this venture, you will gain access to a cryptocurrency miner that operates at the intersection of physical assets, Web3, and blockchain technology. This innovative miner guarantees a continuous revenue stream for the project.

drops.title: Izanami's Cradle: Land Deeds
drops.subtitle:
Discover the Legend of Izanami's Cradle.

Become the owner of unique lands, farm Resources, explore Points of Interest, fight Epic Bosses & receive Rare Artifacts and Weapons.

Level up the Buildings on your Land to Unlock Extra Staking Slots and Higher Bonuses. 
Are you ready? You can use $FRTN to acquire Land Deeds and become the first ever Ryoshi Dynasties official landowner.

drops.title: JAFC-Comics
drops.subtitle: Introducing ROAD TO GOAT - a comic by JAFC COMICS on the cronos chain. The covers come as a free mint. Enjoy the stunning hand-drawn art of Keeve Neo,  read our medium article and join our community.

drops.title: Coom Cats
drops.subtitle: COOM - Create Our Own Movement
drops.description: Join Coom Cats to be a part of a private club, earn passive income through our presale platform, and much more.  Join the movement.

drops.title: Ryoshi Diamonds
drops.subtitle:
Ryoshi Diamonds: A new rewarded game-fi experience for the Crofam! 
To celebrate the launch of the Playing Cards Collection #1 Ryoshi Diamonds, the Ebisu’s Bay team introduces the “Crypto Hodl’em” contest, with over 500k $FRTN and exclusive NFT rewards, adding new layers of utilities and possibilities to the Ebisu’s Bay Ecosystem.
drops.description:
Ebisu’s Bay recognizes the importance of nurturing a vibrant and supportive community. As the contest unfolds, members of the Crofam will have the opportunity to engage with the captivating NFTs and partake in an event that not only celebrates creativity but also reinforces the symbiotic relationship between art and technology.

The upcoming Playing Cards Collection marks yet another pivotal moment in the history of the Bay, bringing together individuals who are not just collectors, but pioneers in the new era of Cronos.

drops.title: BOB Headz
drops.subtitle: BOB Headz is super limited collection with unique utility to holders! There will be more than 200+ traits and multiple legendaries to be found!
drops.description: Our mission for this collection is to grow our community with more and more positive people who like Cronos and are looking for project who has different utilities. To get even more exposure and find new people, this collection we will launch on different platform where is a lot of traffic! You can already try to guess what is this platform, but full info will be announced in upcoming days.  GOAL As you know we like utility and each of our collections has different utilities to match everyone's taste. This collection goal is to make community more active, because it will have unique and fun utility.  UTILITY This collection will unlock our new game - Flappy BOB Game that everyone knows and are easy to play using PC or Mobile. BOB Headz will be used in our game and everyone who holds BOB Headz can play it! We will have online leaderboard where we will track players with best scores every week and we will reward them! But it will be harder than you think! Each NFT will be 1 life. Life resets every 24H, so if you hold 1x BOB Headz NFT, you can play 1 time per 24H. If you hold 10x BOB Headz, you can play 10 times per 24H and so on... The more Headz you own, the better chance to get better score. There also will be burn mechanism - part of secondary sale royalties we will use to sweep BOB Headz floor and burn them. This way we will reduce total supply from time to time. So this collection will be more and more valuable in the future. LEGENDARY BOB HEADz In our collection you can find 20 1/1 Legendaries and if you mint one of them, you can claim their bounty!

drops.title: The Luckl355
drops.subtitle: Where resilience meets opportunity. We are a diverse community of individuals who've faced setbacks and failures but now unite to support each other. Our name symbolizes our strength born from adversity. Through masks and specialized factions, we express our unique reflections and maintain our anonymous online identities.
drops.description: The Luckl355 community provides support, resources, and fosters collaboration for members facing a wide array of challenges, with a mission to build an inclusive, empowering community that helps members achieve success and fulfillment in their personal and professional lives.

drops.title: Ryoshi Tales: Goblin Gala
drops.subtitle:
Enter the World of Ryoshi Dynasties

Rumors have it that there are spooky creatures living beyond Felisgarde. Goblins and corrupted Ryoshis are seen wandering, gathering $FRTN from fallen Dynasties.

Perhaps they could be friendly and might make valuable additions to the Bank or skilled fighters; after all, the Barracks will always welcome extra hands.

Join Ebisu at the Goblin Gala and contribute to yet another chapter in the Ryoshi Tales.
drops.description:
Embrace Spooky Season!

As the lanterns cast an eerie glow and October 27th descends upon Felisgarde, a parade of strange creatures emerge across the region.

Ryoshi Tales: Goblin Gala Collection Details:

Supply: Limited to 500 NFTs
Mint Per Wallet: 1 mint every 5 minutes until the collection reaches its limit
All $FRTN will be burned upon minting
Mint Directly from Your Rewards Pool:

Users can mint directly from their Rewards Pool at the full price without impacting their Karmic Debt.

Acquire New NFTs for Staking:

Collect these new NFTs and bolster your staking capabilities in the Barracks or the Bank, enhancing returns based on the rarity of your acquisitions:

Top 5% Rarity: +0.25%
Top 10% Rarity: +0.2%
Top 20% Rarity: +0.15%
Others: +0.1%

Wishing the best of luck to everyone!

drops.title: Ryoshi Heroes
drops.subtitle:
The Heroes Gen.0 Collection is a collection of unique and powerful Heroes that will play a crucial role in the gameplay experience of Ebisu's Bay. Each Hero will bring their singular skills in the battlefield, leading your army, get access to Heroes cloning, gather resources and accomplish legendary quests! 

Heroes Gen.0 are the first of their kind, and they have been carefully crafted to be balanced and fair. If you want to be a leader in Ebisu's Bay, then you will need a Hero Gen.0 on your side.
drops.description:
A limited amount of 330 unique and powerful Heroes will be available for mint on Ebisu's Bay today November 2nd, 2023. 

**Mint details**: 
- Available for mint: 330 Heroes Gen.0 
- Time: 8pm UTC 
- Maximum mint per wallet: 20 
- Bids start at 15,000 $FRTN, moving to a lower mint price at each bid, as price will re adjust every 5 minutes. 
- Auction duration: 24 hours

**Note**: Each bid will lower the price for everyone. If you minted at a higher price, you will be able to withdraw the difference. 

**Of all $FRTN spent**: Once minted out and the final price is set, all remaining $FRTN will be burnt except: 
- 0.25% to Ebisu's Owners 
- 0.25% to Felisgarde's Owners 
- 1% to Lighthouses' 
- Owners 1.5% to Inns' Owners 

Proceeds will be deposited to the owner's rewards vault during season 2

Learn more about Heroes on our Wiki: <https://www.notion.so/ebisusbay/Heroes-bf7562f290d947fd8dac095aa9c6f883> 

**Get your Hero Gen.0 today!**

drops.title: Ryoshi Tales: Celestial Celebration

drops.description: An esteemed member of the Ryoshi elite, gracing the grand Celestial Celebration with their regal presence. This noble attendee, adorned in cosmic finery, is among the distinguished few who illuminate the 2-year anniversary of Ebisu’s Bay. Each character represents the zenith of Ryoshi society, from the starlit courts of royalty to the esteemed ranks of high command.

drops.title: Ryoshi Tales VIP

Each tier will last 10 minutes, here's the schedule:

drops.title: Argonauts Gears
drops.subtitle: The Argonauts Gears NFT collection, a crucial lever for dominance in Atlantis Trove V2.
drops.description:
The Argonauts Gears NFT collection, a crucial lever for dominance in Atlantis Trove V2.

Gear is essential to your team’s success in Atlantis V2 and will be a game changer for many. With each team able to equip 5 pieces of gear, it will be a race to see who can achieve the optimal team to win it all.

Equip your teams, boost your points and turn the tide of competition. Gear up, strategize, and race to the top with the power of Argonauts Gears at your side.
